cards.rules_text: Choose a nonland permanent type, then destroy all nonland permanents that aren't of the chosen type.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“And on that fateful day, under a warm, crimson sun . . . the sky fell.”
—Fakadeh[/i]

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Until end of turn, All-Enduring Mafua becomes a 5/5 Cat Warrior creature with lifelink and indestructible. [i](He doesn't lose loyalty while he's not a planeswalker.)[/i]
[-2]: Exile target creature.
[-X]: Return each creature card with mana value X from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.rules_text:
Flash
Flying
Prodigious Panya has base power and toughness 4/4 during extra turns.
cards.rules_text2: If it isn't an extra turn, take an extra turn after this one. [i](Cast a copy of this spell once while this creature is on the battlefield.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast if you cast a spell with a mana payment of exactly {U} this turn. The same is true for {R}.
Once each turn, when you cast a blue or red instant or sorcery spell with mana value 1, you may pay its mana cost. If you do, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.notes:
!update reworked: Was {1}{U/R}{U/R} and legendary. Reduction instead let you freecast with flash if you cast both spells. Trigger changed from copying the first mv1 instant or sorcery for free.
!renameof Plaxolotl Pyari

cards.rules_text: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield, then exile all but one of them.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Let's just try it. What's the worst that could happen, he dies again?”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Threshing Sundew enters, merge up to one target creature card in your graveyard under it. Threshing Sundew has that card's abilities.
When Threshing Sundew dies, return all other cards merged with it to their owner's hand.

Flying, haste
{2}{R}{R}, Exile a multicolored card from your graveyard: Return Rainbow Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. If it's your declare attackers step, it enters attacking.

Whenever Warhound Shuja attacks, look at the top three cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value less than or equal to Shuja's power from among them onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may cast creature spells from the top of your library.
You may pay {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} rather than pay the mana cost for creature spells you cast.

{GU}: Pangoling gains hexproof until end of turn.
{GU}: Move a counter from target creature you control onto Pangoling.
{GU}: Whenever Pangoling deals combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card. Activate only once each turn.
{1}: Pangoling gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.

Protection from spells
When Msuji Sureshot enters, search your library for an instant, sorcery, or Aura card that targets, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

Menace, haste
Whenever Manic River-Fishers attacks, you may search defending player's library for an instant or sorcery card that shares a name with a card in their graveyard and cast it without paying its mana cost. That player shuffles.

cards.special_text:
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature, then put your choice of a menace, deathtouch, or trample counter on it.
[0]: Target creature or Xiong planeswalker you control fights target creature you don't control.
[-1]: Target player sacrifices a permanent.

[+2]: Until end of turn, up to one target creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains trample and vigilance.
[-2]: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or tapped creature.
[-3]: Create a 1/1 green Insect creature token, a 2/2 white Cat creature token, and a 3/3 red Ox creature token.
[-8]: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +X/+X and gain trample and vigilance, where X is the number of creatures you control.

[+1]: Up to one other target permanent gains hexproof until your next turn. Untap it.
[-3]: Put target nonland permanent into its owner's library third from the top.
[-8]: Shuffle any number of cards you own from your graveyard and/or outside the game into your library. You get an emblem with “Permanents you control have ‘{T}: Draw a card.'”

cards.rules_text: When Frontier Savior enters, return up to two target creature cards with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Flying
When Tal, Locus Sentry enters, choose a noncreature, nonland card type.
Spells of the chosen type cost {1} more to cast.

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, you may exile target permanent that player controls. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

{WB}: Kambiro, the Untrue King gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Whenever a storied permanent you control enters, if you cast it, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. If that creature's power is less than Kambiro's power, you may return it to the battlefield instead. [i](Enchantments and legendary permanents are storied.)[/i]
Each player sacrifices a creature with the highest power among creatures they control and a creature with the lowest power among creatures they control.

Flash
Flying
When Lunar Emissary enters, exile another target creature you control until Lunar Emissary leaves the battlefield.

Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, their life total becomes 10.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“You may pass through the gates, but be warned—not all prosper in immortality.”
—All-Enduring Mafua[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
{BG}, Discard a creature card: Badru, the Skyshadow becomes a copy of the discarded card until end of turn, except he has flying and is 5/5.

Deathtouch, lifelink
At the beginning of combat on your turn, for each creature your opponents control, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you do, those creatures fight each other.
Once each turn, you may pay {U} rather than pay the mana cost for a blue spell you cast.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“See the beyond. Taste it. Consume it as it consumes you. Become one with the infinite void and learn true power.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flash
Blind Blackguard can't block.
When Blind Blackguard enters, target player draws a card, then reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from that player's hand, then that player puts the chosen card on the bottom of their library.

Enchant opponent
Enchanted player plays with the top card of their library revealed.
You may cast the top card of enchanted player's library, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast it.
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
cards.rules_text2: Copy target instant or sorcery spell you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.notes: !append2 (Cast a copy of this spell once while this creature is on the battlefield.)

cards.rules_text: The owner of target creature or planeswalker shuffles it into their library, then they may create two 1/1 blue Bird creature tokens with flying. If they don't, they reveal cards from the top of their library until they reveal a nonland permanent card, then they put that card onto the battlefield and shuffle the rest into their library.
Whenever you cast a spell that targets, Fume Whisperer gets +1/+1 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn.
cards.rules_text2: Gain control of target permanent. [i](Cast a copy of this spell once while this creature is on the battlefield.)[/i]

cards.rules_text: Choose any target. Change the text of target instant or sorcery spell to “This spell deals 3 damage to the chosen target. Draw a card.”
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The land has spoken, your shield broken. I'll be the last to fall for your tricks.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Flying
Whenever Fakadeh, Florid Queen attacks, you may exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard with mana value 3 or less.
Whenever Fakadeh deals combat damage to a player, cast any number of cards exiled with her without paying their mana costs.

{1{G}W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Artful Chari.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may remove a number of +1/+1 counters from Chari equal to that spell's mana value. If you do, copy that spell, and you may choose new targets for the copy.

Deathtouch
Once each turn, you may cast a creature spell from your graveyard by paying life equal to its mana value rather than paying its mana cost.

Whenever an Aura you control becomes attached to a creature, choose one —
• Raiding Gnoll-Band deals 3 damage to that creature.
• That creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn.

Players can't gain life.
Whenever a player casts a spell, Rage of the Ravaged deals 1 damage to that player.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The most dangerous fighters in Ndengo were those on the brink of defeat.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
When Colony Queen enters, create three 1/1 green Insect creature tokens.
Insect tokens you control have flying and deathtouch.

At the beginning of your first main phase, exile target card in a graveyard. If it's a creature card, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. If it's a land card, add {C}. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, you gain 3 life.

Menace
Whenever an opponent activates an ability of a permanent, if it isn't a mana ability, Howling Shieldbreaker deals 2 damage to that permanent or player.

Enchant permanent
Enchanted permanent is a colorless Swamp Forest land.
Whenever enchanted permanent becomes tapped, its controller loses 1 life.

Haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, create two nonlegendary token copies of Thrice-Clawed Troika. Then for each creature token created this way, create token copies of each permanent attached to Thrice-Clawed Troika and attach them to that creature token. Exile all tokens created this way at end of combat.

At the beginning of your upkeep, mill a card.
Whenever a creature card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, if that card has flying, you may put a flying counter on Berylscale Alaj. Repeat this process for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, hexproof, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.
Each player sacrifices six permanents.

Vigilance
If you would take a combat phase or a main phase, take the other instead.

{3}{GW}{GW}{GW}: If Unlikeliest Heroes has vigilance and not indestructible, put four +1/+1 counters and an indestructible counter on it.

You may cast a multicolored card that's different colors and costs less from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

Vigilance

At the beginning of your end step, gain control of target permanent you own.

At the beginning of each other player's upkeep, draw a card, then discard a card unless you have Am'atambi, Fable Weaver deal 3 damage to you.
You may reveal creature cards as you draw them. Once each turn, when you reveal a creature card this way, you may pay {3}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's 3/3.

If another multicolored card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere other than your hand or library, if no cards exiled with An'yama, Elder Guardian are exactly that card's colors, you may instead exile that card and put a +1/+1 counter on An'yama.
As long as An'yama has four or more counters on them, they have protection from everything.

As Aparodist enters, choose a non-Human creature type.
Aparodist is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
{1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control of the chosen type.

Canid Simulacrum enters with each counter on it from among +1/+1, flying, first strike, deathtouch, lifelink, menace, reach, shield, trample, and vigilance. [i](If it would be dealt damage or destroyed, remove a shield counter from it instead.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control enters, move two random counters from Canid Simulacrum onto that creature.
